Html: I'm trying to use WaveOut to play wave files. However WaveChannel32 supports only 16 bit wave format. How can I play 8-bit audio (recorded with AudioIn) ?

Hi wkdj,

Is it not possible for you to record the audio in 16 bit to start with?

Alternatively you need to upscale the audio to 16 bit before you read it in to WaveChannel32.

Have a look at this blog post for an example on how to do this with NAudio: http://mark-dot-net.blogspot.com/2008/11/using-naudio-to-replace-babysmash-audio.html

Cheers,
Sebastian
